name: ClaimInquire
title: Inquire on a PAS request
description: This operation is used to inquire about the status of a prior authorization request that was previously submitted to a payer.
comment: This operation allows providers to check the status of a previously submitted prior authorization request by providing identifying information such as the claim identifier or authorization number.

parameter.name: identifier
parameter.documentation: The business identifier of the original claim being inquired about

parameter.name: patient
parameter.documentation: Reference to the patient for whom the prior authorization was requested

parameter.name: provider
parameter.documentation: Reference to the provider who submitted the original request

parameter.name: authorizationNumber
parameter.documentation: The authorization number assigned by the payer (if known)

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: A Bundle resource containing the ClaimResponse(s) and supporting resources that match the inquiry criteria
